stories.text: I may start a US based company with a German cofounder.  Are there any laws or issues I should be aware of that would prevent me from issuing shares to an overseas person?
stories.title: Ask HN: Legality of splitting equity with overseas cofounder
Poll suggests tensions high between vaccinated and unvaccinated in Canada

stories.text:
An acquaintance mentioned that their company got a bomb threat today via email.

I haven't seen anything in the news about this being wide-spread, but after a bit of digging on twitter, it looks like this was a large spam campaign to cause trouble for the owner of a certain site.

https://twitter.com/ThePaul_T/status/1450337247455293440/photo/1

https://twitter.com/NetworkString/status/1450440492756385797/photo/1

Did you or your company get this email? I'm curious how wide-spread this was.
stories.title: Ask HN: Did you(r company) receive a spam bomb threat today?
